column5: Airbnb's recommended choice, rated SUPER-HOST of this area.  Modern Apartment in the heart of Arlington. Tx  We are located right off Interstate 30. You are only 1.8 miles away from The Dallas Cowboy Stadium, Six Flags is only 1 mile away, Hurricane Harbor is less than a mile (right across from the property), The Ballpark in Arlington (aka Globe Life Park) is 1.8 miles away from the property, and DFW Airport is 12.3 miles away!!! Perfect location.
